Title: Lumayo Ka Nga Sa Akin
Director: Julius Alfonso, Chris Martinez, Andoy Ranay
Writer: Bob Ong (novel), Bob Ong (screenplay), Eric Cabahug (screenplay)
Actors: Maricel Soriano, Herbert Bautista, Cristine Reyes, Candy Pangilinan
Plot: Inspired by the Scary Movie series, the film parodies mainstream Filipino movies and television shows, as well as popular culture, while tackling several national issues at the same time.
